disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Mana Surge.

blurb.value: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

description.value: Innate: Xerath periodically empowers his next basic attack to restore 30 − 195 (based on level)  mana, doubled to 60 − 390 (based on level) against enemy champions.

description2.value: Mana Surge does not trigger if Xerath would restore above his maximum mana.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Manasurge does not occur against structures and wards. PENDING FOR TEST: Manasurge's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Arcanopulse.

blurb.value: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

description.value: Active: Xerath charges for up to 3 seconds to increase Arcanopulse's  range while being gradually slowed over the duration, by up to 50%. Arcanopulse can be recast at any time within its duration.

description2.value: If the charge completes without reactivation, Arcanopulse is cancelled, refunding  half of the mana cost.

description3.value: Recast: After a 0.5-second delay, Xerath fires a beam of energy in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Arcanopulse will always fire from the original recasting position. The following table refers for interactions while Xerath is channeling: Type Charge channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Disabled Movement Allowed Items Usable N/A Disabled All items are disabled Interrupted by N/A Consumables Disabled, but can still use trinkets. Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled Teleport Recall Interrupted by Hexflash (Recasts) Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Eye of Destruction.

blurb.value: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.

description.value: Active: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy upon the target location which strikes after a 0.5-second delay, revealing the area, and dealing magic damage to all enemies within and slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

description2.value: Enemies in the center of the blast take 66.7% increased damage and are slowed by a greater amount, decaying down to 25% over the duration.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shocking Orb.

blurb.value: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.

description.value: Active: Xerath fires an orb of energy in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and stunning them for 0.5 − 2 (based on distance the orb traveled) seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Shocking Orb will cast from wherever Xerath is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Rite of the Arcane.

blurb.value: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.

description.value: Active: Xerath unleashes his true power, channeling and revealing himself for up to 10 seconds, during which he gains a wider field of view, though not a larger vision range, and is granted the ability to recast Rite of the Arcane to send a barrage multiple times within its duration after a 0.5-second delay of the activation.

description2.value: Recast: Xerath launches a blast of arcane energy to the target location which strikes after 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage and briefly granting sight of the area. Each cast has a static cooldown of 0.8 seconds.

description3.value: If none of the recasts were used and Rite of the Arcane's channel times out or Xerath manually interrupts it, half of the ability's  cooldown is refunded.

description4.value: Rite of the Arcane's recast will cast at max range cast if cast beyond that.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. The recast is named Arcane Barrage. A circular indicator will be displayed at the target location to signify that the area will be blasted. A circle indicating the ability's maximum range forms on the map over 1 second (starting small and rapidly expanding to the maximum range over the delay) for the channel's duration. The maximum-range indicator is visible to both allies and enemies and is color coded for friendly (blue) or hostile (red). Rite of the Arcane uses a barrage system so that it can be recast multiple times within a given period at no additional cost. Xerath will turn to face toward the direction of the target location after using a recast. Xerath can use Dark Passage while channeling. The following table refers for interactions while Xerath is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Interrupts Abilities Disabled Movement Disabled for the first 1.25 seconds, otherwise, interrupts. Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled Flash Hexflash Interrupted by Teleport Recall Interrupted by Death Silencing effects Teleport is disabled for the first 1.25 seconds of the channel.
